content: >this pattern is available for downloading also on payhip 1 with a pay what you want option --- **pattern features ** - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - instructions written in metric and us terminology - three sizes small 54 sts in the hand medium 60 sts in the hand and large 66 sts in the hand - modified arched thumb gussets - symmetrical round tip decreases - charts but no written instructions for the stranded colourwork pattern - estimated yardage needed 30-40 grams of mc and 15-25 grams of cc 1 https //payhip com/b/fkb8
